1.content:
Just passing on a fun idea, esp. if you live in a town like me where lot of late College/Sorority girls come out trick-or-treating.

I had this idea about 2 weeks before Halloween, just in time to set it into motion & make it happen.

My housemate Joe knew that I 'couldn't' be there on Halloween but was keen to help decorate. He appreciated the help. I had one idea that I in particular thought was a good one. Hoo-boy, was I right'

For the sake of keeping this to the point, I won't describe the rest of the d'cor, but it was great. The part that really matter, though: the 'dead' bodies. I made 5 of them, pretty realistic, really. They were life-sized, wearing either old flannels & jeans of mine, or a store-bought costume. Each of them had either a stuffed rubber mask over the heads or a stuffed ski mask. I have to say, they were pretty realistic'especially that sixth'

We have a porch with five steps to climb. On Halloween evening, one of these dummies was laid just beneath the bottom step. One was placed on the third step. The others were placed on the porch, just above the top step. I pulled the mask over my face, and laid on my back, closest to the door, parallel to the door, leaning up against the wall right under the door. My head was sideways, positioned just below the doorbell.

I was psyched. This was the first (and so far only) time I've tried anything like this, and all of the variables were running through my head. What if nobody comes? What if I'm found out? What if I guessed wrong & people just stepped around? What if'? What if'?

Looking out at the porch, though, my mind started to settle. I wouldn't be found out'these looked awesomely like dead bodies strewn about, and the lighting was dark (blacklights and one orange bulb). This house always attracted cuties, so I shouldn't have a problem here'the past few years we had a steady stream of people'I'd never heard of sorority trick-or-treating before, but I guess some of them do it on the way to the frat down the street. Awesome placement of our apartment, Joe, I had to think towards my roommate. And people couldn't step around'the bodies on the porch were so densely packed, that they'd HAVE to step on them to get anywhere near the door. So I waited.

what I realized was Amanda J, an incredibly hot young brunette MILF, holding her 2-year old who must have somehow already tuckered out but really wanted to keep going. At coming up the stairs, her little tyke got really scared. I did, after all, do a great job with the decorations. 'Aww, don't worry, sweetie,' she comforted him with, 'these are all fake, just big toys like we have at home!' He didn't seem like he particularly believed her, so she started stomping on each of them as she walked by. Now THIS was hilarious for the two-year old!! Mommy's stomping things, and things that look like people!!! When she came to me, she jumped up & landed with two feet on the side of my head next to the doorbell. I know must have let out a gasp, but it was covered by the sheer loud belly laughing of the kid, joined with the laughing of Amanda as she fumbled to keep her balance. She rang the doorbell and moved one foot to my neck. 'See, Matty?? It's just a toy. If it wasn't, I'd be doing some major damage here!!' And with that, she ground the toes of her sneakers hard into my neck. Believe it or not, I was honestly a little happy when Joe came to the door. After it opened, she moved to the right, now standing with one foot on my stomach and one on my groin. After a brief discussion of how realistic these dummies are (complete with a few more stomps and grinds) and how poor Matty (who now had tears of laughter in his eyes) had been scared at first, she said goodnight to Joe. As he closed the door, Amanda gave one more good jump onto each of the bodies (mine included of course) and left for the next house, laughing with her kid.

That felt great, but now I was starting to get a little worried'she was just one person; one person not paying as much attention to me as to her son. I was hurting a little (from the initial jump on the head), and had barely kept from moving. What would happen if there were more, and I were to involuntarily move? So far, both sets of people had jumped, and none of the sororities had been here yet'

11.content:
I didn’t have much time to ponder this, as what should appear next? A gaggle of girls from campus. Now, some of them have had a crush on Joe for a while…he was a local boy, he was still known to frequent the beach and the gym in town, and he was ripped, and he knew it. “This is it!!” they whisper-squealed to each other as they moved towards the house. As they made their way closer, they were saw the bodies. “Lame!” one exclaimed. But as she climbed up, she started feeling just how realistic it was. “This is so weird…it really feels JUST like I’m really stepping on a body!” [and this wasn’t even me yet]. The second one started up, and was surprised as well. “That’s SO weird!!!” she loudly stage-whispered, as she slipped off her sandals to take in just how realistic they were. As the third was coming up, the fourth moved to the side of the bottom railing, the first person of the night to trigger the motion sensor. A light flashed and a dark, deep laugh arose from speakers strategically placed around the porch. Being HS girls in a silly, giggly mood, at the house of a boy they like, they all screamed and jumped as far up the stairs as quickly as they could. All 4 were now standing on me, at least partially. One, wearing Ugg boots I believe, had both feet on my head. One (in platforms) had one leg on my neck and one on my chest. One in (something flat-soled) had one foot on my stomach and I’m not sure where the other was (I assume the dummy next to me), and the barefoot chick had one foot on my now-hard cock and one on my leg. As they caught their breath, the barefoot one slowly moved her foot down my member once, before quickly stepping back on and exclaiming to the other ones: “WOW!! This one’s so realistic, it’s actutally got…a penis!!”

“No!!” “Hahahaha!!” and “Seriously?!?!” exclaim the others, as they bounced in place. They all stepped on to the dummy next to me, and each took a turn bringing their foot up and down it once or twice and squishing it down with whatever footwear they had, sometimes standing, sometimes just stomping. “Did they put a banana in there, or a pickle, or what??” And then, I still can’t believe it, the barefoot girl decided that she should to try her best to squish it flat, to mash that banana, until it went flat. The other girls mounted back onto their original places on me, and she went at that banana. After probably honestly 30 seconds (hey, I held out for a while, considering everything else happening leading up to it!!), the banana indeed did get flattened. (Through their combined weight holding me down, I guess they couldn't feel my shudder of extasy). “I guess it was a banana and not a pickle after all…” declared barefoot hotty, “…I finally broke through the peel and have mashed sticky white banana coming through my toes now…eew…ah well.” As she wiped her feet vigorously on my inner thigh to get the “mashed banana” off of her soles, the girl on my head finally rang the doorbell. I don’t know what exactly Joe was dressed as (I didn’t have the greatest view of him from under those boots), but from the squealing, jumping/bouncing, and comments from the girls then and as they left a few minutes later, I’ve pieced together that he must have either not had his shirt on, or at least probably had it opened. After getting their candy and keeping him at the door as long as they possibly could (bouncing with glee periodically), he finally closed the door, and they started their way off of the porch.

Wow…I was thrilled, and simultaneously nervous… this was just a very small percentage of the people who’d be coming tonight, and though I felt GREAT, I was really starting to hurt. Should I try to get up, or should I stay down? As I started pondering this, I realized that someone else was coming up, so I had to freeze.

When I heard the next group coming, my heart sank a little…I heard at least two distinct male voices coming up the steps. One of the hazards of a hiding place like this I suppose. As it turns out, when they tripped the motion sensor, they were more excited to find the hidden speakers around the porch than to spend much time near the bodies! What incredible luck…I still can’t believe it! The girl with them stepped up to ring the doorbell, her heeled shoe pressing into the lower half of my face. Even through the mask, this was painful, and yet wonderful. The guys only briefly stepped on to grab their share of the candy, then hopped back off, checking out our hidden sound system (boy, was I glad I had installed those so well!).

As the night proceeded, the order gets a little fuzzy, but I believe what came next was the proverbial fat-kid-now-HS-Senior, dressed as a witch, taking her “little” sister with her. By little, I mean shorter; she definitely proved to be heavier than Amanda from earlier in the night. Meaner, too, as they stomped their way up the bodies, confessing to each other that they were pretending these bodies were those of everyone who’s made fun of them over the years. Boy, did they have some pent up anger or something, because it was a few very long minutes before they (FINALLY) rang the doorbell!! By this time, they were breathing heavily, rocking back & forth from foot to foot as they stood there, filled with adrenaline. These, of course were on my now sideways-turned (kicked) head, neck-chest (foot turned slightly), stomach, & groin. It was everything I could do not to shout out, but having seen the anger in these two I thought better of it. My roommate Joe took what REALLY seemed like forever, though; as it turns out (from what he told them), he had been “indisposed” (going potty) when the doorbell first rang. Was I ever glad when they kicked their way back down the porch and over to the next house!

Now I REALLY wanted to get up, but absolutely could not…the next group was coming up the stairs. Definitely a mix of guys and girls, and definitely a bunch of them. They piled onto the porch, which, though there was four grown “bodies” laid out across the floor, still barely had room for all of them! All I know is that someone dressed as a French maid was the one to stand on my head, and I can only hope that the guys out of sympathy for the bodies stayed off of the groin. This must be what it felt like to be at the bottom of a youth mosh-pit, I imagine, as I was a WRECK by the end of it!! I was just glad that French-Maid was the one person to stay where she was the whole time…having that many people on and off of my head as carelessly as they were on and off of the rest of me would likely have put me FAR beyond my limit!!

As they left, I heard a crack of lightning. As I took a few seconds to stretch/shift/rearrange myself slightly, I heard the pattering of rainfall. Crap…that might just be the end of my night, I thought. I can’t say it wasn’t eventful, but those Alpha Gamma Omega girls never showed, nor had any one from Gamma Sigma Sigma! I was about to get up, lick my wounds, and enjoy the memories of the night, when I heard the sound of running up the path and eventually up to the porch. Joe’s sister, now soaked & somewhat stressed, hopped onto my face & neck, rang the doorbell, & stood there shivering. After a minute’s talk with Joe about the rain wrecking her plans, she asked if she could come in for a hot drink & to call a friend for a ride. “Sure,” said Joe, and she firmly wiped the mud from her sandals onto my groin before entering. She always was nice about not tracking dirt in the house; I’d have to compliment her on it the next time I saw her!

This pretty much confirmed for me that my night here was done…the rain was pouring now, and no one was to be seen but her. Only the really desperate for candy would be out at this point. Then again, it was early in the night....

15532.content:
Jack pulled up in front of the Delta sorority house. It was the first time he had come to visit his older sister Susie since she’d gone away to school. The front door flew open and Susie ran to meet him on the lawn, her brown hair flying behind her.

“Jackie!” She smiled and threw her arms around him.

“Please don’t call me that.” He grimaced and pried her arms away from his neck.

“It’s good to see you, little brother.”

“Same.” He nodded and looked up at Delta house. “I never thought you’d live in a place like this. My sister: a sorority girl.”

“You should see the inside. Stacy and Diana went home for Fall Break, but the other girls are excited to meet you!”

“I’m excited to meet them.” He chuckled and Susie smacked him. “Don’t be a perv.”

“I’m not!” He protested and they laughed.

“Let me help you get your stuff.” She said and ran around to the back of his car.

“I didn’t bring much.” He said and opened the trunk.

“Susie, hey!” A voice said and they both turned.

An older woman in a white blouse and tight black pants waved, running towards them with a stack of orange papers under one arm. Her chest bounced lightly as she jogged, and Jack’s mouth hung open a little as he stared. She may have been older, but this woman was clearly in great shape.

“Professor Nelsen.” Susie waved. “I thought you went home for the break?”

“Call me Angie.” She smiled. “I thought about it, and I decided to throw a Halloween party instead for all the girls still on campus.” She held out a bright orange flyer.

“Girls only?” Susie asked, looking at Jack.

“Yeah. Sorry. Who is this?”

“Oh, this is my kid brother Jack.”

“Nice to meet you Jack.” Angie shook his hand. “Anyway, I’d love to stay and chat, but I still can’t figure out how I’m going to decorate my house for the party. I want it to be scary, but I’ve never been very good at decorating.” She admitted.

“Well you’re in luck.” Susie shoved Jack forward. “My little brother is a techie at his high school. I’m sure he could help you decorate.”

“Oh no. I wouldn’t make you help me with a party I didn’t even invite you to!” She shook her head.

“It’s fine. I’d love to help.” Jack said.

“Really? That would be amazing!” Angie smiled.

“When would you like me to come over?” He asked.

“Would tonight be too much trouble?”

“Oh no. I’ll have Susie give me directions.”

“Wonderful! I guess I’ll see you then. Will you give these to the other girls in your house?” She handed the fliers to Susie.

“Of course.” She answered.

Jack sighed. This wasn’t exactly how he had planned on spending the night, but at least Susie’s professor was smoking hot. Spending the night decorating with her wouldn’t be so bad. But how would he decorate her house?
He thought over the possibilities for a moment, and then was struck with an idea.

He could try it. He could finally try it. This would be the perfect excuse, the perfect time.

Suddenly he knew exactly how he would decorate, and the thought made his heart race. He watched Angie walk to the next house, jogging up the steps to knock on the door, and noticed how good her butt looked in those tight black pants.

“Oh my god, stop staring at her.” Susie laughed and smacked his shoulder.

“I wasn’t!” He denied it and followed his sister into her house.



A few hours later and after a quick trip to the store, he pulled in front of Angie’s house. She heard him drive up and met him on the lawn.

“It’s Jack, right?” She asked.

“Yeah.”

“I can’t tell you how grateful I am for your help. I’ve never been good at this sort of thing.” She gestured around the bare lawn with a sigh. “So what’s the plan, Jack?”

He went around to the back of his car and opened the trunk.

“We are going to make some dummies.” He said, hauling a series of bags onto the lawn. “I picked up a few masks and some cheap gloves which will be perfect.”

“How are we going to make dummies?” She asked, putting her hands on her hips.

“Easy. Packing tape.” He smiled and held up a huge package of tape. “We’ll use me as a model, I’ll show you how, then we take the shells and stuff them with these clothes I picked up from the thrift shop.”

“Why clothes?” She asked.

“They’re cheap and really heavy when you pack them together. It gives the dummies a real weight and makes them more realistic. Then when we’re done, we just sell the clothes back to the store.”

“I like it.” She said. “Let’s get started.”

Jack demonstrated how to make the dummy on her arm, wrapping her up with two layers of packing tape, then carefully cutting the new tape mold off her arm and taping it back together.

“I’m impressed.” She smiled.

“Now we have to wrap me up.” Jack grinned.

Angie began by wrapping the tape around his chest, then his arms. Her hands touched him lightly and he couldn’t help but feel that he was an absolute genius.

They made five dummies together, and once they were stuffed Angie excused herself to finish the indoor decorations for the party.

Jack clothed the dummies, put gloves on their hands, boots on their feet, and the creepiest masks he could find on their faces.

He took a step back to look at his work. They had the same body type as him and were almost as heavy as real people. Halloween wasn’t until the next night, and he didn’t want anyone to see the final product, so he had Angie open her garage and he hauled all the bodies inside, ready to be set up for the big night.

“I’ll come back and set everything up before your party.” He told her. “They’re pretty heavy and I wouldn’t want you to have to cart them around.”

“How do I thank you? They look terrifying!” She clapped her hands together.

“Happy to help.” Jack smiled.

Now all that was left was for him to set up the dummies and make his own costume. He might not have been invited to the party, but that wouldn’t stop him from making a surprise appearance.



The next day was Halloween. He drove to her house early while everyone was still in classes for the day. He needed the time to set everything up. Angie had given him the garage door code, so he pulled out each dummy and set them somewhere around the yard. The masks were gruesome and the overall effect was even creepier than he had envisioned. Once he was satisfied with their placement he went back to his car for the finishing touch. He drove the car around the corner and parked in front of an empty lot.

He reached into the back seat and pulled out another mask, similar to the rest, and a thick pair of gloves. There was one more dummy to make. He slid the mask over his head and donned the gloves. One last look at his phone told him that Angie would be arriving any moment.

Jack hurried back to the porch, took a moment to survey the dummies, and then climbed the steps to the front door. He lay down in front of the doorstep and was pleased to find that, since the door was a few inches off the ground, his body lined up with the door quite nicely.

He had never done something like this before. It was crazy and irrational. He didn’t want to think about what might happen if someone caught him. But how could he pass up an opportunity like this? He heard the sound of tires rolling up to the house and held as still as possible.

1553211.content:
He awoke to the sound of footsteps. A thought tugged at his memory. There was something important that he needed to do. But what was it?

The snatch of a conversation reached his ears and he remembered. He needed to leave! The party was going to start soon and if he couldn’t handle one person on top of him, the traffic of the party would almost certainly be too much.

A group of people made their way up the porch steps and he realized it was too late. He must have passed out when Angie stepped on his head. The party was starting.

Four girls moved towards him, one stepping onto his chest. She was a dainty thing dressed as an indian. He blessed her moccasins, grateful that she wasn’t wearing heels. The indian girl rang the doorbell and looked down at him while they waited for the door to open.

“This thing is pretty realistic.” The indian girl said and did a little test bounce on top of him. Even though she was small, the bouncing wasn’t doing him any favors.

Angie opened the door and the indian girl jumped inside to hug her with a squeal. The other girls waited behind her to greet Angie, and the next girl stepped onto him. She was a tall cowgirl, heavier than the last. He would have been happy to let her stand there because he could see straight up her miniskirt, but her cowboy boots had sharp spurs on the heel. The spikes dug into his skin through his clothing. He held his breath, praying that the indian girl would hurry up her introductions. The cowgirl stepped into the house, but before he could be relieved, the next two girls, dressed as twins, hopped on top of him.

One of the twins stepped onto his groin, the other on his chest and stomach. One person had been bad enough. He had never expected that he would have to handle two girls on top of him. He felt like he was being flattened into the ground.

His eyes watered and a groan escaped his lips.

The twins looked down at him in surprise.

“Hey Angie?” They called out to her.

“Yeah?” She popped out the door.

“This dummy just made a sound when we stepped on it.”

“What?” Angie looked surprised. “He didn’t…” She looked down at him and his heart raced. They knew. They were going to catch him.

“Jack must have put one of those buttons inside it that make sounds.”

“But I didn’t hear anything when I stepped on it.” The cowgirl said.

“It must take more than one person to trigger.”

“Cool.” They said together and began to bounce lightly on his chest. He grunted, resisting the urge to move away. They stood in the doorway for a few moments, talking excitedly to one another, until finally someone inside the house caught their attention and they left him alone on the porch.

15532111.content:
He hardly had a moment to compose himself when he heard a familiar voice. It was Susie, surrounded by the other girls from Delta house.

“Wow! I didn’t know Jack had this in him.” She said as they approached.

“Are we supposed to stand on this thing?” One of the girls asked as they came to the door.

“I think so.” Susie said and put one shoe on him hesitantly. “It’s sturdy enough.” She stepped on him in earnest as she rang the doorbell. He never realized she was so heavy.

“Fun!” Her friend said and jumped on top of him, followed by the rest. He was unable to stop himself from grunting as the door opened.

“Did this thing just make noise?” A girl asked as Angie appeared.

“Hey girls! Welcome! And yeah, Susie’s brother Jack made these things. Aren’t they freaky?”

“He’s full of surprises.” Susie laughed.

“Angie!” Her friend squealed and jumped up and down on Jack’s chest, violently forcing the air out of him. “Let’s take a picture!” She suggested and pulled out her phone.

“Get on here Angie!” Susie pulled Angie out of the house and onto the last part of Jack that was left. He moaned, the pressure of them all was far too much.

The three of them posed for the picture while he prayed for relief. This was beyond anything he had ever wanted.

They might have stayed on him forever, crushing him under their shoes, but another wave of guests arrived and the girls hurried into the house with Angie, praising Jack’s decorations as they went.

For the next twenty minutes a steady stream of girls entered the house.Angie told a few of them about the sounds he made when more than one person stood on him. His ribs ached and he paid incredible attention to the breaks in between guests. As soon as everyone was here he could run away. Or limp away.
